column5: HAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!! im dying/crying
Is kissing a fish really all that much different than eating sushi?  JF
A friend of mine bought some sushi once, took it home and cooked it up.  Said it tasted a lot like fish.

If you're eating good sushi there's no slime.  Now would the fish's slime have more bacteria or the person who's sliming the fish have more??!! We might be endangering the fish's health with a slimy kiss.
My wife won't give me the chance. She's got the lip lock on them 2 seconds out of the water.
in the right company, all sorts of things happen lol
Kiss the fishy! Kiss the fishy!  MMMMMMM-Smack! Shagalicious, baby!  If the walleye weighs 6 lbs or more I release it.
and would you tell your wife if you did. This seems to be the latest on the fishing shows.
Well if Dave Mercer does it....  We all have to do it!!!   That said... you can get VERY sick from doing so.  G
I do it all the time!!! - once you get past the smell - you got it licked!   Don
MJL once offered to give me free weights if i french kiss a carp ... hmm ... maybe i will give that some thought this season
hahah I kiss my musky sometimes.... and thank them for costing me $900 a pieces hahah
Yes i do it all the time,especially walleyes !!!!   they are my buddies,and yes sometimes they deseve a kiss,for a job well done LOL...LOL... great question,cant wait to hear all the answeres...
This questions seems a little fishy. I don't kiss 'em  but I certainly eat 'em.
No fish kissin for me... a quick pat on the head for a good fight and being a worthy adversary then back in the drink they go
A gentlemen never tells.  I haven't yet.
sometimes you have to kiss on them before you mount them.lol  jason
Love to see him French kiss a 30lb catfish.  With that said, no, never have and would have to have drank a few wobblies before I could be talked into thinking about it.
Not I...but have kissed guys that are as boring as fish..open and close, open and close...
do you still respect them in the morning?
I don't kiss them, but they do get the privilege of having their pic taken with me!
NOPE Just a quick pat on my reel for hanging tough and, another to the rod for standing up like a man for the task at hand.
Can a person get sick from kissing a fish?  forrest
If you kiss the Mermaids (or any other species for that matter) you can get Beaver Fever.  No different than drinking untreated water.
Does this qualify as sick to you? http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dysentery  Had it when I was 12 and spent 4 days in the hospital.
Ya know Wayne, I can honestly say I have never associated Beaver fever with kissing fish ... but then again its probably all in the technique ... and who's
Nope.    and neither does Ben.
See what Jimmy Houston started, now everyone does it. Should be careful using tongues though.   Never have kissed one, and I hope I never have to.
Yep, having dysentery would definitely qualify someone as sick.  I think I will stick to kissing clean babies and the wife.  forrest
I only kiss smallmouth bass and any largemouth that tells you different is a LIAR!!!

With smaller fish I sometimes open my mouth and stick their head as close to my mouth as I can...then I growl. It's a warning to the fish that he keeps on going with his ways...sooner or later he will be my dinner.
